file.title: Find file

p.text: The property searches files and folders in the specified directory. For searching you can use a pattern - "*","?","+". E.g. if you specify "a*.jpg", it would find all files with extension jpg beginning with "a" (for example, "аbcdef.jpg", "a2.jpg", "a.jpg"). For "a?c.exe" it would find all applicaions consisting of three letters beginning with "a" and ending with "c" (for example, "аbc.exe", "a2c.exe").
